content.rendered:
Keeping your Car Safe and Secure.

Whilst you’re away, your car will be stored in one of Maple Parking’s secured car parks. All of our car parks –

  1. Are private property
  2. Have perimeter fencing and security lighting
  3. Have CCTV or are patrolled or are manned 24/7
  4. Have a hard standing surface
  5. Have gated entrances / exits

Additionally (with the exception of our Edinburgh Airport car park) all of our car parks have been awarded the prestigious Park Mark Award. Park Mark is awarded for safety & security and has to be renewed annually ensuring that the car park is well maintained and always fits the requirements of the scheme.

We also photograph all vehicles on arrival or prior to movement for both your and our peace of mind. This in addition to all of our drivers being fully insured, professional and CRB checked, means that your car could not be in safer hands. Our drivers are trained to park with care, from taking your keys to the moment your vehicle is returned.

WE GO THE EXTRA MILE TO MAKE SURE THAT YOUR CAR NEVER WILL.
